about_the_game:
Whoa! Behold, the second collection of tracks from "Trombone Champ," one of the "Top 10 Trombone-Based Games of September 2022." We can personally guarantee that each of every one of these songs contains sounds... sometimes a few sounds, sometimes many sounds. If you like music, you may enjoy this soundtrack!

All tracks are arranged by Holy Wow Studios, with the exception of "Max Tundra's Silent Night" and "The Sailor's Hornpipe," which were produced by legendary musician Max Tundra, and "Commander Tokyo, the Dancing Robot," which was produced by CV.
